courses.title: Our Engineering Programs
courses.description: Discover our range of engineering programs, each tailored to equip students with practical skills and a deep understanding of the engineering landscape.

coursesList.name: Computer Science & Engineering
coursesList.description: Delve into the world of computer science, learning everything from programming fundamentals to advanced algorithms and data structures.

coursesList.name: Electronics & Computer Engineering
coursesList.description: Explore the intersection of electronics and computing, with courses covering circuit design, microprocessors, and embedded systems.

coursesList.name: Mechanical Engineering
coursesList.description: Gain a thorough understanding of mechanical systems and engineering principles, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and material science.

footer.about: We provide free, high-quality resources for engineering students, helping them succeed in their studies and careers.
footer.credits: made with by Easy Tutorials
